about.details:
Incorporated in 2005, Ahmedabad based Vaxtex Cotfab Limited is engaged in the business of Textile processing of fabric and trading. The Company does Processing (dyeing and finishing) of grey fabrics for shirting, suiting, and other accessories. It also works on an outsourcing basis for other fabric/garment companies.

Vartex has a processing unit and a Packing and Storage unit located at Narol, Ahmedabad in Gujarat. The installed capacity of the processing unit is 12,00,000 meters/month for processing of various fabrics from natural and man-made fibres specializing in 100% cotton, Giza & Supima cotton blended fabrics, polyester viscose and polyester cotton. The company undertakes corporate orders for Finished Fabrics from brands.

It also has a dedicated in-house Testing and Quality Control Team which undertakes testing and quality management.

Competitive Strengths

1. Strategic location advantage in Ahmedabad, Gujarat
2. Experienced promoters
3. Strong technical capabilities for maintaining high product quality
4. Sound financial track record with revenues showing an increase of 581.84% and
313.99% in 2016-17 and 2017-18.

faqs.question: What is the Vaxtex Cotfab IPO?
faqs.answer:
Vaxtex Cotfab IPO is a SME IPO of 1596000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹3.83 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹24 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on December 27, 2019, and closes on January 3, 2020.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Vaxtex Cotfab IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Vaxtex Cotfab IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Vaxtex Cotfab IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Vaxtex Cotfab IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Vaxtex Cotfab IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Vaxtex Cotfab IPO?
faqs.answer: Vaxtex Cotfab IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Vaxtex Cotfab IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Vaxtex Cotfab IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Vaxtex Cotfab IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Vaxtex Cotfab IPO will be done on Wednesday, January 8, 2020, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, January 10, 2020. Check the Vaxtex Cotfab IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Vaxtex Cotfab IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Vaxtex Cotfab IPO listing date is on Monday, January 13, 2020.
